amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase by 5% each fiscal year for four years, the percent amount that the Export/Import Bank should make available for small businesses. Non-compliance with such policy would bar Ex/Im from issuing any loans over $100 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to Senate amendment to text to increase by 5% each fiscal year for four years, the percent amount that Ex/Im should make available for small businesses. If they do not comply, they are barred for issuing any loans over $100,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 303 (Roll no. 607).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 303 (Roll no. 607).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Perry.
